Leland follows the story of Leland P. Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of his would-be lover and mentally unstable classmate Laura (Rachel McAdams). This is a compelling, troubling, and ultimately a poetic film.
